bioconda.name: minipolish
bioconda.summary: A tool for Racon polishing miniasm assemblies.

biocontainers.name: minipolish
biocontainers.summary: A tool for racon polishing of miniasm assemblies

biotools.summary: A tool that bridges the output of miniasm (long-read assembly) and racon (assembly polishing) together to polish a draft assembly. It also provides read depth information in contigs.

bioschemas.name: minipolish
bioschemas.summary: A tool that bridges the output of miniasm (long-read assembly) and racon (assembly polishing) together to polish a draft assembly. It also provides read depth information in contigs.

galaxy.bio_tools_summary: A tool that bridges the output of miniasm (long-read assembly) and racon (assembly polishing) together to polish a draft assembly. It also provides read depth information in contigs.
